name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wiser Social Media: Focus & Stop Wasting Time

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace home feeds, recommendations and other social media distractions with inspirational quotes. News Feed Eradicator alternative.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace home feeds, recommendations and other social media distractions with inspirational quotes. News Feed Eradicator alternative.
Wiser Social Media was designed for those who must use social media for work but do not wish to be exposed to its addictive features, such as home feeds and recommendations.

Source code: https://github.com/zaidmukaddam/wisersocialmedia
